node.name: FlexUnit Plugin
node.shortdescription:
FlexUnit Plugin brings to Actionscript developers what JUnit has done for years for Java. Run your FlexUnit test from within Eclispe!

For details on how to install this plugin visit:

Install">http://www.codesquared.com/eclipse/installinstructions.html">Install Instructions

New In Version 1.1.0:
Wizard support to automatically generate the test harness

Dynamic creation and execution of tests direct from the actionscript class

Bug Fixes
Special thanks goes to Mickeal Ruellan for assisting in get the MAC compatibilty issues resolved.
node.body:
FlexUnit Plugin brings to Actionscript developers what JUnit has done for years for Java. Run your FlexUnit test from within Eclispe!

For details on how to install this plugin visit:

Install">http://www.codesquared.com/eclipse/installinstructions.html">Install Instructions

New In Version 1.1.0:
Wizard support to automatically generate the test harness

Dynamic creation and execution of tests direct from the actionscript class

Bug Fixes
Special thanks goes to Mickeal Ruellan for assisting in get the MAC compatibilty issues resolved.
